name: Brainache
overview: After BRAINACHE had left in the robo-shuttle, heading for the STELLA mines on the planet NESBIT, the crew on ROTAR 1 began to worry - Although they teased BRAINACHE, they loved their chubby friend and knew how dangerous the task ahead of him really was ... On the lonely cruise back to Nesbit, BRAINACHE planned his actions. He was fed up with his friends cynical comments and decided to show them once and for all how clever he really was. He would retrieve all his mining equipment and then forage further into the depths of the ancient mine shafts to find the fabled ANATESE diamond. "Then they will never call me BRAINACHE again", he muttered determinedly under his breath!!
